title: and Katie Maloney
description:
Vanderpump Rules Katie Maloney-Schwartz gets real with LaLa and Randall as she details her struggles with PTSD after a 25-foot fall through a skylight. She describes the horrific accident, rehabbing from a brain injury, broken jaw, and cracked ribs, and dealing with survivor's guilt. Katie also speaks about her wedding to Tom Schwartz, how she ended up on Vanderpump Rules in the first place, and offers some great advice to anyone dealing with online trolls and haters.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
